column4: (10.10) I have been unable to print graphics from the image viewer or gimp.  I've tracked to down to apparently the new verison of libcairo2 being broken, but i've followed a few different sets of instructions on  reverting to this older version and nothing is working
I see now that there is
sudo mv /etc/apt/sources.list.d/getdeb.list.bck /etc/apt/sources.list.d/getdeb.list               make sure /etc/apt/sources.list.d/getdeb.list   doesn't currently exist
was thinking of that myself till i saw it was epty
where is the link made to? what folder?
its no longer alink, i've hard copied it
that's not gonna work. symlink it to ~/.mozilla/plugins    should work
please tell me you don't run your browser as root
i think the problem is that I dont have a kernel installed which allows userland tunnels
install chromium then link it in /usr/lib/chromium-browser/plugins
